Returns: true if the listener has consumed the event (i.e., the default behavior should not occur), false otherwise (i.e., the default behavior should occur). The default behavior is for the camera to move to the map and an info window to appear.
onMarkerClick(com.google.android.gms.map.Description: Called when a marker has been clicked or tapped.

ClassDesc: Defines signatures for methods that are called when a marker is clicked or tapped.
